import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Tiles from "../ui-design/Tiles"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import './Home.css'; import { useRef } from 'react'; import { Tilt } from 'react-tilt'; function Home() { let [animateload, setanimateload] = useState(false); const defaultOptions = { reverse: false, // reverse the tilt direction max: 25, // max tilt rotation (degrees) perspective: 1000, // Transform perspective, the lower the more extreme the tilt gets. scale: 1, // 2 = 200%, 1.5 = 150%, etc.. speed: 300, // Speed of the enter/exit transition transition: true, // Set a transition on enter/exit. axis: null, // What axis should be disabled. Can be X or Y. reset: true, // If the tilt effect has to be reset on exit. easing: "cubic-bezier(.03,.98,.52,.99)", // Easing on enter/exit. }; let slickNonAutoSliderSettings = { dots: false, infinite: false, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: false, cssEase: "linear", variableWidth: false }; let slickSliderSettings = { dots: false, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, speed: 30000, autoplaySpeed: 0.0001, cssEase: "linear", variableWidth: false }; return (
M O H I T
S A T O S K A R

); } export default Home;
